thoughtText: Najee Harris will have a top 10 RB performance this 2023 season. The Steelers have made significant updates to their O-line this off-season which has been the weakest part of the offense during Najee's tenure with the team. Also, Steelers have silently made it clear that this is a make or break year for Mr. Harris
Some of the best programming is done on paper, really. Putting it into the computer is just a minor detail.
